title: In the Lives of the Tudors, Hints of the Present-Day Monarchy
description: An exhibition at the Metropolitan Museum of Art reveals the majesty of this former royal family and the manipulation of its image to exude power and relevance.
dc:creator: James Barron
category: Elizabeth I, Queen of Great Britain
Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
